class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration
class.query: select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.title = :title and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.shortTitle = :shortTitle and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.participant p where cpr.collectionProtocol.shortTitle = :shortTitle and p.empi = :empi
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId and cpr.participant.id = :participantId
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId order by cpr.id
